column5: In a thread a week or so ago, we discussed how Winners had been hacked... well I just read that Club Monaco has reportly been hacked as well. Just a heads up for any who like to shop for every day things and pay a whole lot for them!  Not my cup of tea, but ... thought I'd pass it along! Can you immagine the up roar if BPS got hacked... now that's something that would hit home!!! HH
